index_banner.title: Costa Coffee
index_banner.subTitle: Costa Coffee know great coffee. The proof? They've been serving their legendary signature blend in London since 1971. Now you can experience it in a can or bottle on the go. Just pick up your favourite flavour and crack it open.

index_banner.title: Made from 100% Recycled Plastic
index_banner.subTitle: We don't just bottle our British spring water, oh no. We vapour distill every drop for purity before adding electrolytes to create our distinctive, clean, crisp taste.

index_brand.title: Costa Coffee
index_brand.description: Served in London since 1971, Costa Coffee's signature blend is the perfect balance of delicate Arabica and strong Robusta beans, slow-roasted for a smooth and nutty flavour and rich aroma. Now you can experience it in a can on the go.

index_brand.title: Oasis
index_brand.description: Oasis is a great tasting refreshing still drink made across seven delicious flavours.

index_brand.title: GLACÉAU Smartwater
index_brand.description: GLACÉAU Smartwater is made from British spring water which is vapour-distilled before electrolytes are added. It has a distinctive, crisp, clean taste and is produced and bottled in Morpeth, Northumberland. All our Smartwater bottles are now made from 100% rPET.
